channel.title: Wtf is wrong!?!?!?
channel.description:
i am almost done with my server so i try and test it by loging in with 2 accounts on the same pc. so i have 1 guy kill another. to simplify my question, the 2 people will be represented as a and b. so A kills B. (i have both screens open each taking up half the screen)
now heres the problem. on A's screen, player B is still standing there after he was killed. on player B's screen, he teled to the bank like he was supposed to. i couldnt fix it. on 1 screen theres a guy in the bank and in the other hes next to a guy. help! [br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 13, 2008, 01:44:36 AM[/size][hr]sorry i posted this 2 times. i wasnt shore if it worked

You aren’t updating player A. So the client still see’s the person standing there.
